message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm hoping to get a better price. How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer you the product for $110.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. If you're serious about selling, I'm willing to go up to $100. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer you the product for $112.50.
Alice, I'm getting a little frustrated with this negotiation.  I'm willing to go up to $105, but that's my absolute limit. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to move on.
I understand your frustration, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $107.50. This is my final offer.
